snippet: Young sailors are becoming the norm at the top of the professional heap because they have been sailing with catamarans and hydrofoils longer than some of their veteran Cup competitors.
abstract: America's Cup will feature five foiling catamarans, favorite of many young sailors, in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Young sailors are becoming the norm at the top of the professional heap because they have been sailing with catamarans and hydrofoils longer than some of their veteran Cup competitors.

headline.main: For Experience, America’s Cup Teams Turn to Newcomers
headline.print_headline: For Experience, Teams Turn to Newcomers
